segments.text: I'm observing a peculiar scene unfold in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is absolutely pouring over the front of the sink basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a large, widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in the middle of it, yet she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is fully on, and the water just keeps coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's so oblivious to what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause quite a bit of water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets below are already getting soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a disaster, and she's just polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like a small waterfall right there on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will be before she finally looks down.
segments.speaker: PAR
